articles.title: BBC Breakfast's Jon Kay sends health check warning after 'no symptoms'
articles.description: Breakfast star was joined by Midlands Today legend Nick on Tuesday's show.
articles.content:
Jon Kay has declared a "big thank you" to Nick Owen for his openness on his cancer battle. The BBC Breakfast star was joined by Midlands Today legend Nick on Tuesday's show.

articles.title: Johnny Ruffo and partner Tahnee Sims mark six years since actor’s cancer diagnosis
articles.description: Johnny Ruffo and his partner Tahnee Sims have shared a health update, as the former Home and Away star continues his battle with brain cancer.
articles.content:
Johnny Ruffo and his partner Tahnee Sims have shared a health update, as the former Home and Away star continues his battle with brain cancer.

articles.title: Cutting London’s air pollution could ease pressure on mental health services, say researchers
articles.description: A new study suggests cutting pollution could reduce the use of such services by dementia patients by as much as 13%
articles.content:
T he number of dementia patients using London’s community mental health services could be significantly reduced if levels of air pollution are cut, research has suggested.
The findings come from a team at King’s College London, who studied the use of... [4272 chars]

articles.title: The health care crisis plus other letters, Aug. 8: ‘Poaching physicians from other countries is unethical and unnecessary’
articles.description: In today’s letters to the editor: African politics; the Northwest Passage; wildfires; foreign-trained physicians; copyright in Canada; BCE; supply management
articles.content:
Colonial history
Re “France’s ‘Africa problem’ is Canada’s, too” (Aug. 3): France has long sought to maintain a level of influence on its former West African colonies that Canadians would never dream of tolerating from Britain.

articles.title: Τι είναι η ξηροφθαλμία: Σε τι οφείλεται και τι συνιστούν οι ειδικοί
articles.description: Health & Fitness - Τι είναι η ξηροφθαλμία: Σε τι οφείλεται και τι συνιστούν οι ειδικοί | Athens Voice
articles.content: Nιώθετε να μην μπορείτε να ανοίξετε το πρωί τα μάτια σας; Έχετε φαγούρα και θολότητα; Η ξηροφθαλμία είναι μια συνηθισμένη πάθηση που οφείλεται στον κλιματισμό και στον υπερβολικό χρόνο που περνάμε μπροστά σε οθόνες. Εμφανίζεται για δύο βασικούς λόγου... [2689 chars]

articles.title: The dangers, and health benefits, of gardening
articles.description: Dr Muiris Houston: You can pick up serious injuries and ailments from horticultural activity, but some risk assessment will mean you enjoy only the advantages
articles.content:

articles.title: Plan for vaccine-damages scheme stalls despite ‘priority’ pledge
articles.description: Department of Health says resources necessary to progress scheme were directed towards Covid-19 public health response
articles.content: At least 25 jurisdictions globally have vaccine-injury compensation programmes, 16 of which are in Europe. Most schemes cover medical expenses, disability pensions and death benefits, and payments are usually based on the severity of the injury. Phot... [4457 chars]

articles.title: Regional climate changes drive life-threatening zoonotic disease outbreaks
articles.description: Outbreaks of polycystic echicnococcosis, a life-threatening zoonotic disease, are driven by regional climate changes, according to a study led by the Barcelona Institute for Global Health (ISGlobal), an institution supported by "la Caixa" Foundation.
